Posts.Content: mistymoley Hi Flower powder   It's not abnormal, definitely mention it to your oncologist at your next appointment if it's within the next 10 days, if not, ring your BCN to chat through. thank you , I will ring my BCN

Posts.Content: Hi I am new on here , I have just finished chemotherapy , which was not good as I ending up in hospital 3 times, I wanted to ask is it normal to get pain in your nipple area ?
